greenmirror.server

Interface Visualizer.PlaybackState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PausedState, PlayingBackState, PlayingState, SteppingBackState, SteppingState
    Enclosing class:
    Visualizer

    public static interface Visualizer.PlaybackState
    An abstract state class in accordance with the state design pattern.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void determineButtonOperation(boolean hasPreviousMemento, boolean hasNextMemento)
      The method that determines the toolbar button operation in accordance with hasPreviousState and hasNextState.
      default boolean isContinuous() 
      @NonNull String toString() 

    • Method Detail

      • determineButtonOperation

        void determineButtonOperation(boolean hasPreviousMemento,
                              boolean hasNextMemento)
        The method that determines the toolbar button operation in accordance with hasPreviousState and hasNextState.
        Parameters:
        hasPreviousMemento - whether the visualizer has a previous memento
        hasNextMemento - whether the visualizer has a next memento

      • isContinuous

        default boolean isContinuous()
        Returns:
        whether this PlaybackState is a continuous one

      • toString

        @NonNull String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a simple explanation of this state, used in the visualizer to indicate which playback state is currently active
